data.eml:eml: A new leafhopper genus Comahadina Huang and Zhang (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae) and a key to genera of Eupteryx - complex

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Min, Zhang, Yalin (2010): A new leafhopper genus Comahadina Huang and Zhang (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae) and a key to genera of Eupteryx - complex. Zootaxa 2353: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275643
